column4: does any one know how to add ssh keys to the authrized_keys file?
does any one know how to add ssh keys to the authrized_keys file?
copy your .ssh/id_rsa.pub to the machine you want to connect to, then cat id_rsa.pub >> .ssh/authorized_keys
or you could just do: ssh-copy-id -i .ssh/id_rsa.pub user@host
